passageway_entrance_west.name: enter{Passageway entrance at Shuttle Train platforms. Shuttle Train Platforms start approx 200 feet ahead. Platform number 1 serving tracks 1 and 3 is slightly to your left at 10 o'clock.  Platform number 2 serving track 4 is slightly on your right at 1 o'clock.  There is no track 2. Next train leaves in [TrainLeaves]}exist{Passageway to Mezzanine with access to trains 4,5,6 and 7 and exits to Grand Central terminal and  tostreet level}

shuttle_platform_3.name: Shuttle Train Platform area. All three tracks on this platform are Times Square bound. Caution: Trains stop before reaching end of tracks. To access 4,5,6,7 trains and Grand Central Terminal, use the East bound passageway. There are exit stairs to either side of the passageway entrance
